findings.lower_thorax: The lung bases are clear with no pleural effusion.
findings.liver: There is a focal fat seen in hepatic segment 4. Otherwise liver is homogeneous in attenuation with no focal lesion noted.
findings.biliary: There is no intrahepatic or extrahepatic biliary ductal dilatation. The gallbladder is normal. There is no sludge or stone.
findings.pancreas: The pancreas is homogeneous in signal with no focal lesion or pancreatic ductal dilatation.
findings.spleen: The spleen is normal in size with no focal lesion.
findings.adrenal_glands: Right and left adrenal glands are normal.
findings.kidneys: The kidneys are normal in size with no hydronephrosis.
findings.gastrointestinal_tract: The bowel is normal in caliber without obstruction.
findings.lymph_nodes: There is no mesenteric or retroperitoneal lymphadenopathy.
findings.vasculature: There is no thrombosis or aneurysm.
findings.osseous_and_soft_tissue_structures: There is no suspicious osseous finding. There is a 1.0 cm T2 hyperintense heterogeneously enhancing lesion containing 0.7 cm collection in the anterior abdominal wall suggestive of resolving infectious/collection of the prior drainage tract.
